text: Deione is a genus of Asian orb-weaver spiders first described by Tamerlan Thorell in 1898. ==Species== it contains four species: *Deione lingulata Han, Zhu & Levi, 2009 – China *Deione ovata Mi, Peng & Yin, 2010 – China *Deione renaria Mi, Peng & Yin, 2010 – China *Deione thoracica Thorell, 1898 – Myanmar ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Asia Category:Taxa named by Tamerlan Thorell
title: Deione
